# tcp-srv

`tcp-srv` is a simple TCP server publishing data from `I2C` and `SMBus` sensors.

## Example

```sh
$> tcp-srv -dbg
tcp-srv starting up server on: :10000
tcp-srv connection from: 127.0.0.1:56218
tcp-srv --> recv: {2017-01-12 18:08:47.840591531 +0000 UTC {0.6046602879796196 0.9405090880450124 0.6645600532184904} {0.4377141871869802 0.4246374970712657} [{0.6868230728671094 0.06563701921747622} {0.15651925473279124 0.09696951891448456}] {0.30091186058528707 0.5152126285020654 0.8136399609900968}}
tcp-srv connection from: 127.0.0.1:56220
tcp-srv --> recv: {2017-01-12 18:08:50.840474938 +0000 UTC {0.21426387258237492 0.380657189299686 0.31805817433032985} {0.4688898449024232 0.28303415118044517} [{0.29310185733681576 0.6790846759202163} {0.21855305259276428 0.20318687664732285}] {0.360871416856906 0.5706732760710226 0.8624914374478864}}
tcp-srv connection from: 127.0.0.1:56222
tcp-srv --> recv: {2017-01-12 18:08:53.840379155 +0000 UTC {0.29311424455385804 0.29708256355629153 0.7525730355516119} {0.2065826619136986 0.865335013001561} [{0.6967191657466347 0.5238203060500009} {0.028303083325889995 0.15832827774512764}] {0.6072534395455154 0.9752416188605784 0.07945362337387198}}
tcp-srv connection from: 127.0.0.1:56224
[...]
```
